title: An error occurs when you create a record from an Incident if the title is too long
content:
When you create a record (Problem/Article/News/Change/Request) from an Incident, if the title is too long, a "Field value is not valid" error occurs.

Cause

The logical type of the display label is "Medium Text" for Incident while the logical type of the display label is "Small Text" for the other records.

Solution

To work around this issue, revise the new record's title and include the details in the symptom description.
